sentences.en: But the Middle East never fail to teach one the limits of human foresight.
sentences.cn: 但中东问题复杂多变,人们很难加以预料.

sentences.en: During the blizzard I was glad I'd had the foresight to buy enough groceries.
sentences.cn: 在那场大风雪中,我庆幸自己深谋远虑,事先买了足够的食品杂货.

sentences.en: Foresight had preserved the guns of the previous war for use against U - boats.
sentences.cn: 远大的预见使上次大战中用来对付潜艇的大炮被保存了下来.

sentences.en: He is a man of foresight.
sentences.cn: 他是个有先见之明的人.

sentences.en: He was later criticised for his lack of foresight.
sentences.cn: 他后来被指责缺少先见之明。

sentences.en: However, hindsight is easier than foresight.
sentences.cn: 然而, 后知总是比先见容易.

sentences.en: If impulse is weak, foresight may conquer; This is what is called acting on reason.
sentences.cn: 如果冲动弱下来, 预见就可能取胜, 这就是所谓的按理性办事.

sentences.en: If you had had more foresight , you would have saved yourself a lot of trouble.
sentences.cn: 如果你当时深谋远虑, 你就不会有那么多麻烦了.

sentences.en: It needs not so much foresight now as direction.
sentences.cn: 它这时就不需要远见而只需要指导了.

sentences.en: It required a statesman's foresight and sagacity to make the decision.
sentences.cn: 作出这个决定需要政治家的远见卓识.

sentences.en: It was an example of the authorities’ lack of foresight .
sentences.cn: 这是当权者缺乏远见的一个例证。

sentences.en: One shrewd thing he did, which indicated the foresight and subtlety of the man.
sentences.cn: 他干的那件精明事, 表现了这个家伙的深谋远虑和巧妙干炼.

sentences.en: She had had the foresight to prepare herself financially in case of an accident.
sentences.cn: 她有先见之明，经济上作了准备以防万一发生事故。

sentences.en: The failure is the result of our lack of foresight.
sentences.cn: 这次失败是由于我们缺乏远虑而造成的.

sentences.en: They had the foresight to invest in new technology.
sentences.cn: 他们有投资新技术的远见。

sentences.en: This required a sharp eye, foresight and forceful , not to say ruthless, methods.
sentences.cn: 这需要眼光,手段, 小心,泼辣, 好不至都放了鹰.

words.tran_cn: 深谋远虑的；有先见之明的；能预料的
先见，远见；预见；深谋远虑

trans.tran_cn: 先见，预见，深谋远虑，瞄准器
trans.tran_en: the ability to imagine what is likely to happen and to consider this when planning for the future
